parameters: Alright! Lets see if you can beat me this time.
(There she goes with the dancing again.
I should probably wait until she stops moving.)
Hey you got me that time!
(Nice, without her frost power, She cant maintain that dance forever.)
(If I keep attacking when she drops her dance I should be able to win this.)
I need to expend my energy and
I'll hit her with my STRONGEST technique!
I better wait until her dance falls off!
Right on the jaw! I knew I could win without that stupid power!
You did really good big sis!
But I think its over now.
Lilly sweeps your feet, knocking you to the ground.
You feel a sword put against your throat.
(I need to Guard while she's dodging or I'm going to take a beating!)
Lets see how long you last.
Wail away at my shield while I whip
You are exceeding your limit girl.
I guess its time I use my
No matter how hard you try.
I'm sorry we have to fight
But I need to make it
I guess, I'll have to expend
some of my limit on you Snow.
Snow, you and your inhuman endurance.
I'm juiced out. Lets finish this.
The wolf is on top of you!
The wolf is still on you!
You only had 16 seconds left Snow.
I did you the favor and dragged
both of us into the seal.
Time works diffrently in this hell.
Something Ive been trying to learn.
It just takes a second to kick in...
Allow me to save us all. I wont let you down.
Allow me to show you what I learned over 5000 lifetimes.
Allow me to show you what I learned over 5000 lifetimes.
I will be the one to suffer.
Say hello to your past self.
You wont be able to escape it here...
She is going to hit the portal with something!
You see another portal opening above you..
There is no voice of warning.
I really wish Gravis was here!
Your mother's sword is making a noise!
The Iceblade is molding to your grip!
The sword feels, better for some reason!
All I got to do is hit it!
You can sense the statue speaking to you.
That statue, its summoning those monsters.
The heat of battle against multiple foes.
It's coming back to me now.
The statue roars, summoning 2 more zombies!
I Snow Regalia, will kill you!
